name: Pit Dungeon
description:
You play as John Jr. III, a brave adventurer who seeks to take down the Dead King in the PIT DUNGEON. Collect new items to change your attacks along the way, and defeat the Dead King! Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - MOUSE1

Items: (Your item will turn into The Bullet at the start of a new floor.)
  • The Bullet - Normal bullets
  • Omega - 3 Shot burst
  • Overheat - Hold MOUSE1 to fire a charge shot
  • Fission - Bullets split into 8 smaller bullets upon impact
  • Ankh - Full auto firing
  • Rage - Lower HP results in Increased damage / Fire rate
Runes: (Runes carry over between floors.)
  • Alpha - Damage Up
  • Beta - Health Up
  • Gamma - Speed Up
  • Delta - Health Up / Damage Up
  • Epsilon - Health Up / Speed Up
  • Zeta - Damage Up / Speed Up
HARDCORE MODE is COMING SOON

If you didn't think the original game was hard enough, then let me introduce you to HARDCORE MODE!

[Hardcore Mode Features]

► No Tutorial Text

► Start the game with the RAGE item

► Maxed HP upgrades at start

► Dying once ends the game

► All enemies move faster

► No Items in Item Rooms

► Heart drops are reduced

► No HP up runes (You're already at max HP upgrades)

► Kamikaze Knights explode when shot

Big Thank You to These Streamers!
